attributes.action: Pay the EU nothing (no divorce bill) and go ahead with a hard brexit!
attributes.additional_details: It's high time we stand our ground and be the great nation we are and not the poor pitiful nation the EU are so dead set on us becoming! Time to make Britain great again and show the EU that we WILL NOT bow to their corruption.
attributes.background: I think the UK has paid the EU more than enough and that we should not give in to their bully boy tactics. Don't pay them another penny and let them come to us go for a hard brexit and we will reap the rewards long term as no member of the EU can afford to lose the business and money the UK brings.
